name: Approved
description:
Approved is a tough 2D platformer where you exploit your mobility to pass through the levels. Use the explosions from your lasers to survive spikes and falls.

GAMEPLAY

Be quick and accurate with each shot; take advantage of all the explosions against walls, rockets, and moving cubes that will get you a step closer to being approved! 

HISTORY

 You'll be playing as a prototype robot that needs to pass many tests in the lab rooms from IA ramping up in difficulty.

 


CONTROLS

A,D: Move left and right

W: Jump

Left Click: Shoot

Credits: 

Game developed by Gcry Twitter 

Music & sounds from Zapsplat.com 

Thanks to Adrian Croes for the translation of this page
